oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Using Structural Metadata to Localize Experience of Digital Content
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dushay, Naomi
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Digital Libraries
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With the increasing technical sophistication of both information consumers and providers, there is increasing demand for more meaningful experiences of digital information. We present a framework that separates digital object experience, or rendering, from digital object storage and manipulation, so the rendering can be tailored to particular communities of users.
